About Me

I am a Senior Accessibility Engineer with over 4 years of professional accessibility experience, and nearly 30 years as a daily screen reader user. My background in full-stack development, accessibility auditing, and assistive technology enables me to deliver inclusive, accessible digital experiences.

I hold the IAAP CPACC certification and specialize in working with WCAG compliance, screen readers, mobile accessibility, AI integration, and providing legal rebuttals for clients.

Skills & Expertise

  • Full-stack Web Development
  • Accessibility Auditing & WCAG Compliance
  • Mobile Accessibility (iOS, Android)
  • AI Integration & Applied AI in Accessibility
  • Assistive Technology: JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver, TalkBack, Braille
  • Languages: Python, Ruby, C++, Java
  • Legal Accessibility Support & Client Rebuttals

Accessibility Focus

Accessibility is central to everything I do. As a lifelong screen reader user, I bring unique insight into the challenges people with disabilities face when interacting with digital products. I work closely with clients to ensure their software and services are usable, compliant with standards, and genuinely inclusive.
